about_the_game:
- SUMMARY -

Born in a prestigious priestess family, Shizune Ayatsuji exhibits her talents since young and has been battling against Fiends as an Exorcist.

One day, she took an exorcism request and headed to a forest, only to find a Fiend who broke free from its seal and resurrected.
Shizune fought, but was helplessly defeated...

It was then when Kaori, Shizune's mother and also a powerful priestess, came to rescue her.
Shizune escaped, and made a resolve to defeat that monster at all costs.


- HIGHLIGHTS -

Double-Heroine Exorcist RPG featuring a confident, man-hater heroine Shizune, and her kind, gentle mother Kaori, fighting to purify Fiends and save men who fell under their spells



The Fiends emit "Obscenities", making men horny.
Shizune and her mother offer their bodies to relieve their Obscenities...

But are those really the Fiends' doing...?
Or are those nothing but lust from those men themselves?


- SYSTEM -
Adventure game with focus on exploration.

Next destination is shown in Menu screen, with extra features for convenience.
- Unlock All Gallery switch available after game clear
- Special item to one-shot all enemies

There are 2 main characters, switching in and out as the story progresses.
At Final Chapter, you can freely switch characters and enjoy events♪



Each character also has various costumes!
Put on different outfits and walk around the town, look for events with NPCs......

highlighted.name: I'm So Done With All These Training!
Rot in Hell, You Wicked Fiend!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work:
Nudity, sexual scenes.

It also contain non-consensual sex.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Blazing Priestess Shizune

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Shizune Ayatsuji was born in a prestigious priestess family and raised to become an Exorcist. One day, she confronted a powerful Fiend. Shizune did not stand a chance, but her mother Kaori, also a powerful priestess, came to rescue her. Shizune made a resolve to defeat that monster at all costs.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
